title: Syndra Animation bugs (recall + movement)
body:
-Classic and Justicar Syndra are both starting their recalls with their wind-down animations

(I can't seem to get my video to work and pictures end up being unhelpful, but I have reproduced this a few times with both of these skins via custom games)

-Once you break 350-370 movespeed the same skins will change their normal flying animations to the one we see on Atleantean Syndra

Classic: 
http://oi64.tinypic.com/259bsj7.jpg
Justicar:
http://oi66.tinypic.com/21m7rs2.jpg

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the awesome bug report! ^-^ We're aware of several issues with Syndra at the moment. We made some adjustments to Syndra's model to make the files a bit smaller, which may have caused this issue. :c
I know I'm annoying and childish, but MOM she ain't fixed yet! :*(

So, I looked into this again. We had several issues caused by the Syndra change. 

This is a minor bug, as compared to other issues we're resolving. It's on the list of issues to be resolved, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VJ2G1qzg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-29T18:10:25.427+0000)
>
> So, I looked into this again. We had several issues caused by the Syndra change. 
> 
> This is a minor bug, as compared to other issues we're resolving. It's on the list of issues to be resolved, though.

o, I was just about to come back and ask about this, looks like someone beat me to it. thank you for the reply!

Will the bug fix be listed on any patch notes it gets shipped with?
I'll make a note to do so. As I've mentioned, it's not high priority (but as a side note, we are fixing her run animation bug in 6.7 ^-^).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VJ2G1qzg,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-03-30T22:19:39.018+0000)
>
> I'll make a note to do so. As I've mentioned, it's not high priority (but as a side note, we are fixing her run animation bug in 6.7 ^-^).

I understand, it's not a bug that actually effects gameplay; but I am looking forward to it being fixed.

Thank you for the reply. <3
Sorry for the wicked long wait/update. We're looking to (finally) have this solved for next patch!
